pantherbuddy.business.controller.services

Interface AccountService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccountBO

    public interface AccountService
    The service facade to the application action logic related to user account. It follows the facade pattern.
    Author:
    ALLAN

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      UserModel getUser(java.lang.Integer id)
      The method is used to fetch the user details.
      void loginUser(UserModel user)
      The method is used to grant login into the system.
      void recoverPassword(java.lang.String email)
      The method is used to recover a users password.
      void registerUser(UserModel user)
      The method is used to register a user into the pantherbuddy system.
      void updateUser(UserModel user)
      The method is used to update the user data, primarily his password.

    • Method Detail

      • registerUser

        void registerUser(UserModel user)
           throws UserAlreadyExistsException
        The method is used to register a user into the pantherbuddy system.
        Parameters:
        user - An instance of UserModel.
        Throws:
        UserAlreadyExistsException - Exception thrown if user with same data exists.

      • loginUser

        void loginUser(UserModel user)
        throws LoginException
        The method is used to grant login into the system. If the user is accessing the system for the first time it also activates the user.
        Parameters:
        user - An instance of UserModel.
        Throws:
        LoginException - exception thrown if user cannot login into the system

      • recoverPassword

        void recoverPassword(java.lang.String email)
              throws UserNotFoundException
        The method is used to recover a users password.
        Parameters:
        email - An instance of @link{String} which holds the email id for which the password is requested.
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - thrown when user with input data is not found.

      • updateUser

        void updateUser(UserModel user)
        The method is used to update the user data, primarily his password.
        Parameters:
        user - An instance of UserModel.

      • getUser

        UserModel getUser(java.lang.Integer id)
        The method is used to fetch the user details.
        Parameters:
        id - Id of the user of whom the dtails are saught.
        Returns:
        An instance of UserModel.
